title: Name Refund
body: Hi guys,i managed to change my name and i was trying some cool names,i was trying the name Summoner Hadzov but it was not very good.I didint even clicked anythink i wasnt even touching my mouse and the name just changed.And summoner i writen Summener not summoner.So im asking for help can i get my name refunded pls.I was saving blue essence for such a long time and now, i spent it on nothing ...So PLS help me .IF u can to give my Blue Essence back and my old name pls..

replies.body: I went ahead and checked up on the name 'Summoner Hadzov' and it does not seem to be taken! Go ahead and submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to your EUNE agents and they *should* be able to make this simple change for you on their end!
Yeah but, i want my Blue Essence back and my old name ..what do you think can they hel me ? ;  (
I'm not sure exactly how EUNE handles these things, but it'd be best to hit them up and see what (if anything) can be done.
they said they are not refunding :(

So I pulled up that ticket, and it looks like you were just asking for a refund. The ticket was meant to ask if they could change the name into what you wanted it to be, sorry for that confusion. 

Like I mentioned in the first reply, the agents should be able to help change the name into what you meant to, but they can't simply refund name changes. I'd go back to the ticket and clarify you didn't need a refund and you just needed the name to be what you originally wanted without the typo, but again, it'll be up to your EUNE agents.

EDIT: I'll also reach out to that agent myself and let them know what's going on to help alleviate any confusion and help you along fam ^_^
